relations.structure: 使用深度强化学习框架来构建表达式树
relations.detail: MathDQN通过引入深度强化学习框架，改进了ExpressionTree在构建表达式树时的效率和准确性。
relations.problem_addressed: 解决了ExpressionTree在多步算术问题上的低效和不准确问题
relations.evidence: Our MathDQN yields remarkable improvement on most of datasets and boosts the average precision among all the benchmark datasets by 15%.

relations.detail: MathDQN在Dolphin18K数据集上进行了实验，验证其性能。
relations.problem_addressed: 提供了一个大型且多样化的数据集来评估MathDQN的性能
relations.evidence: We also study the efficiency of these math word problem solvers as users expect to obtain the results instantly.

relations.structure: 使用准确率作为评估指标
relations.detail: MathDQN使用准确率作为评估其性能的主要指标。
relations.problem_addressed: 提供了一种直接衡量模型性能的方法
relations.evidence: Our method runs efficiently and achieves superior performance, especially on the more challenging multi-step problems.

relations.structure: 使用F1分数作为评估指标
relations.detail: MathDQN还使用F1分数来评估其性能。
relations.problem_addressed: 提供了一种综合衡量模型性能的方法
relations.evidence: These findings shed certain light towards a general MWP solver that can evolve without too much human intervention.

relations.structure: 使用整数线性规划生成方程树
relations.detail: ALGES利用整数线性规划生成方程树，并通过学习局部和全局判别模型对其进行评分。
relations.problem_addressed: 有效解决了方程树生成和评分的问题
relations.evidence: We use integer linear programming to generate equation trees and score their likelihood by learning local and global discriminative models.

relations.detail: ALGES在Alg514数据集上进行了实验，验证其性能。
relations.problem_addressed: 提供了一个标准的代数文字题数据集来评估ALGES的性能
relations.evidence: We compare ALGES with previous work and show that it covers the full gamut of arithmetic operations whereas Hosseini et al. (2014) only handle addition and subtraction.

relations.detail: ALGES在Dolphin18K数据集上进行了实验，验证其性能。
relations.problem_addressed: 提供了一个大型且多样化的数据集来评估ALGES的性能
relations.evidence: We compare ALGES with previous work and show that it covers the full gamut of arithmetic operations whereas Hosseini et al. (2014) only handle addition and subtraction.

relations.structure: 使用准确率作为评估指标
relations.detail: ALGES使用准确率作为评估其性能的主要指标。
relations.problem_addressed: 提供了一种直接衡量模型性能的方法
relations.evidence: ALGES achieves 72% accuracy whereas the template-based method achieves 67% accuracy.

relations.structure: 使用F1分数作为评估指标
relations.detail: ALGES还使用F1分数来评估其性能。
relations.problem_addressed: 提供了一种综合衡量模型性能的方法
relations.evidence: ALGES achieves 72% accuracy whereas the template-based method achieves 67% accuracy.

relations.detail: ALGES使用MUC来评估其核心ference解析的性能。
relations.problem_addressed: 提供了一种衡量核心ference解析性能的方法
relations.evidence: We train a local discriminative model to score the likelihood that a math operator op ∈ O can correctly combine two Qsets s1 and s2 based on their semantics and intertextual relationships.

relations.detail: ALGES使用BCUB来评估其核心ference解析的性能。
relations.problem_addressed: 提供了一种衡量核心ference解析性能的方法
relations.evidence: We train a local discriminative model to score the likelihood that a math operator op ∈ O can correctly combine two Qsets s1 and s2 based on their semantics and intertextual relationships.

relations.detail: ALGES使用CEAF来评估其核心ference解析的性能。
relations.problem_addressed: 提供了一种衡量核心ference解析性能的方法
relations.evidence: We train a local discriminative model to score the likelihood that a math operator op ∈ O can correctly combine two Qsets s1 and s2 based on their semantics and intertextual relationships.

relations.detail: ALGES在ACE 2004数据集上进行了实验，验证其性能。
relations.problem_addressed: 提供了一个标准的核心ference解析数据集来评估ALGES的性能
relations.evidence: We use the Stanford Dependency Parser in CoreNLP 3.4 (De Marneffe et al., 2006) to obtain syntactic information used for grounding and feature computation.

relations.detail: ALGES在Ontonotes-5.0数据集上进行了实验，验证其性能。

relations.evidence: We use the Stanford Dependency Parser in CoreNLP 3.4 (De Marneffe et al., 2006) to obtain syntactic information used for grounding and feature computation.

relations.detail: ALGES使用Score来评估其在代数文字题上的性能。
